title: Where the pelican builds her nest
creator_credit: Supreme Sound Studios, Harold J. Pollock and Bank of New South Wales
brief_description: A colony of pelicans in a northern Queensland lagoon, showing the rearing of chicks from egg to fledgling. Other species living in the lagoon are seen briefly, and the need for protection of these birds is emphasised.
creator_credit_for_label: Supreme Sound Studios, Harold J. Pollock and Bank of New South Wales
